title: piccai eDukka
sahitya:
piccai eDukka vanda shankaran AbharaNam pirai mati parambAmE
			(rAgA  nAyaki)


anupallavi



caraNam 1    naccaik-kudattArandO nAyaki parAshakti paccaip-pashumkoNDal pArvati pArttirukka
			(rAgA  nATa)
    caraNam 2    nATTai arashALum nambi mAranirukka vITTai aLikkum Ishan vIDu shuDalaiyAmO
			(rAgA  shrI)
    caraNam 3    mAmara pon malai rAjan maittunan shrIkAntan AmAm adanAlenna haran ADai pulittOlai
			(rAgA  tODi)
    caraNam 4    kOdil umaiyAL nANak-kAlil tODinait-tUkkik-kAdil vaittADiyOn karattil kapAlam Endi
			(rAgA  khamAs)
    caraNam 5    muktiyinbam kiDaikka mAshu tuDittaruLum attan pittanaip-pOl angattil shAmbal pUshi
			(rAgA  dhanyAsi)
    caraNam 6    maNNai shumandE piTTu vAngiyuNDirundavar peNNai shumanda nAthan yAcippadaDipayantO
			(rAgA  dhEnukA)
    caraNam 7    ceTTi vaLaiyal viTru dhEnuka vArttaiyADi kuTTuppaTTa dEvan naTTam vandadAl tAnO
